snippet: President Barack Obama is considering key changes in the nation's immigration system requested by tech, industry and powerful interest groups, in a move that could blunt Republicans' election-year criticism of the president's go-it-alone approach ...

headline.print_headline: Obama Weighs Broader Move on Legal Immigration
headline.main: Obama Weighs Broader Move on Legal Immigration

lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama is considering key changes in the nation's immigration system requested by tech, industry and powerful interest groups, in a move that could blunt Republicans' election-year criticism of the president's go-it-alone approach to immigration.
